items.question: Will there be a 2nd season? Has it been renewed?

spoilerItems.question: What is MGNREGA scheme which is mentioned in the Episode ?
spoilerItems.answer: The Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act 2005 (MGNREGA) earlier named NREGA (National Rural Employment Guarantee Act) approved in September 2005. The primary purpose of this scheme is to employ unskilled workers. They are volunteer to do unskilled Work in rural areas, which will result in the enhancement of livelihood in rural areas. This MGNREGA act will provide at least 100-day unskilled Work on the wage basis to unemployed, unskilled persons every financial year. For more Information please visit - mgnregajobcard com
